mapper.select: SELECT er.result_id AS resultId, er.eval_id AS evalId, e1.name AS evalName, er.target_id AS targetId, e2.name AS targetName, ef.name AS formName, er.score AS score, r.round_no AS roundNo, er.reason AS reason, er.created_at AS createdAt FROM eval_response er JOIN employee e1 ON er.eval_id = e1.emp_id JOIN employee e2 ON er.target_id = e2.emp_id JOIN eval_form ef ON er.form_id = ef.form_id JOIN eval_round r ON er.round_id = r.round_id WHERE er.result_id = #{resultId}
SELECT ep.name AS propertyName, es.score AS score FROM eval_score es JOIN eval_property ep ON es.property_id = ep.property_id WHERE es.result_id = #{resultId}
